markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 1"
    pfs=""
>
[Sack of Rotten Fruit](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1657)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [A Fistful of Flowers](/Sources.aspx?ID=140) pg. 15</row>

**Price** 3 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Hands** 1

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Strike</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Each of these unassuming sacks contains enough rotting fruit to provide a [fungus](/Heritages.aspx?ID=45) [leshy](/Ancestries.aspx?ID=14) with 1 week's worth of rations, along with clusters of stones to help press out the fruit's juices. When you Strike a creature with a sack of rotten fruit, the sack is consumed while the creature takes 1d4 bludgeoning damage and must attempt a DC 15 Fortitude save. On a failure, the creature is [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34). The [range increment](/Traits.aspx?ID=248) of a thrown sack of rotten fruit is 20 feet.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Sack of Rotten Fruit
